properties.areaDesc: Kauai Windward; Kauai Mountains; Kauai Leeward
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 10 at 3:31AM HST until January 10 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
...WIND ADVISORY FOR KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI LANAI KAHOOLAWE MAUI AND
BIG ISLAND...

.Gusty winds associated with strong high pressure northeast of the
state will continue through the day today. The advisory may need
to be extended through the overnight hours tonight.

* WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph.

* WHERE...Kauai. The strongest winds will be through gaps as well
as over and downslope of ridges.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Winds this strong can down trees and large branches
and cause sporadic power outages. Driving may be difficult,
especially for high profile vehicles.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Advisory means that sustained winds of at least 30 mph, or
gusts of at least 50 mph, are expected. Motorists should use
extra caution.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING
